001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base.TableComponentType;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base.TableField;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.FilterStrategy;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.sort.SortingStrategy;
007import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
008import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.exceptions.ReflectionException;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
011import java.util.List;
012
013import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
014
015/**
016 * Service interface defining operations for interacting with table components.
017 *
018 * <p>This interface provides methods for reading tables, retrieving rows, inserting values,
019 * filtering, and sorting table data dynamically.
020 *
021 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
022 */
023public interface TableService {
024
025   /**
026    * Default table component type used when none is specified.
027    */
028   TableComponentType DEFAULT_TYPE = getDefaultType();
029
030   private static TableComponentType getDefaultType() {
031      try {
032         return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(TableComponentType.class,
033               getUiConfig().tableDefaultType(),
034               getUiConfig().projectPackages());
035      } catch (ReflectionException e) {
036         return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(TableComponentType.class,
037               getUiConfig().tableDefaultType(),
038               "io.cyborgcode.roa");
039      }
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Reads all rows from the table.
044    *
045    * @param clazz The class type representing the table rows.
046    * @param <T>   The type of the row representation.
047    * @return A list of objects representing table rows.
048    */
049   default <T> List<T> readTable(Class<T> clazz) {
050      return readTable(DEFAULT_TYPE, clazz);
051   }
052
053   /**
054    * Reads all rows from the table using a specific table component type.
055    *
056    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
057    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
058    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
059    * @return A list of objects representing table rows.
060    */
061   <T> List<T> readTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, Class<T> clazz);
062
063   /**
064    * Reads all rows from the table with only the specified fields.
065    *
066    * @param clazz  The class type representing the table rows.
067    * @param fields The fields to be extracted from the table.
068    * @param <T>    The type of the row representation.
069    * @return A list of objects representing table rows with selected fields.
070    */
071   default <T> List<T> readTable(Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields) {
072      return readTable(DEFAULT_TYPE, clazz, fields);
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Reads all rows from the table with only the specified fields, using a specific table component type.
077    *
078    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
079    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
080    * @param fields             The fields to be extracted from the table.
081    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
082    * @return A list of objects representing table rows with selected fields.
083    */
084   <T> List<T> readTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields);
085
086   /**
087    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table.
088    *
089    * @param start The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
090    * @param end   The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
091    * @param clazz The class type representing the table rows.
092    * @param <T>   The type of the row representation.
093    * @return A list of objects representing the selected rows.
094    */
095   default <T> List<T> readTable(int start, int end, Class<T> clazz) {
096      return readTable(DEFAULT_TYPE, start, end, clazz);
097   }
098
099   /**
100    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table using a specific table component type.
101    *
102    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
103    * @param start              The starting row index.
104    * @param end                The ending row index.
105    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
106    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
107    * @return A list of objects representing the selected rows.
108    */
109   <T> List<T> readTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int start, int end, Class<T> clazz);
110
111   /**
112    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table with only the specified fields.
113    *
114    * @param start  The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
115    * @param end    The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
116    * @param clazz  The class type representing the table rows.
117    * @param fields The fields to be extracted from the table. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
118    * @param <T>    The type of the row representation.
119    * @return A list of objects representing the selected rows with chosen fields.
120    */
121   default <T> List<T> readTable(int start, int end, Class<T> clazz,
122                                 TableField<T>... fields) {
123      return readTable(DEFAULT_TYPE, start, end, clazz, fields);
124   }
125
126   /**
127    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table with only the specified fields using a specific table
128    * component type.
129    *
130    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
131    * @param start              The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
132    * @param end                The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
133    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table rows.
134    * @param fields             The fields to be extracted from the table. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
135    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
136    * @return A list of objects representing the selected rows with chosen fields.
137    */
138   <T> List<T> readTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int start, int end, Class<T> clazz,
139                         TableField<T>... fields);
140
141   /**
142    * Reads a specific row from the table by index.
143    *
144    * @param row   The row index (1-based index).
145    * @param clazz The class type representing the table row.
146    * @param <T>   The type of the row representation.
147    * @return An object representing the selected row.
148    */
149   default <T> T readRow(int row, Class<T> clazz) {
150      return readRow(DEFAULT_TYPE, row, clazz);
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Reads a specific row from the table by index using a specific table component type.
155    *
156    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
157    * @param row                The row index.
158    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table row.
159    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
160    * @return An object representing the selected row.
161    */
162   <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> clazz);
163
164   /**
165    * Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria.
166    *
167    * <p>This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria and returns it as an object
168    * of the specified class.
169    *
170    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values used to identify the row.
171    * @param clazz          The class type representing the table row.
172    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
173    * @return An object representing the row matching the search criteria.
174    */
175   default <T> T readRow(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz) {
176      return readRow(DEFAULT_TYPE, searchCriteria, clazz);
177   }
178
179   /**
180    * Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria for a specific table component type.
181    *
182    * <p>This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria within the specified table component
183    * and returns it as an object of the provided class.
184    *
185    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
186    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to identify the row.
187    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table row.
188    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
189    * @return An object representing the row matching the search criteria.
190    */
191   <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz);
192
193   /**
194    * Reads a single row from the table using a 1-based index and retrieves only the specified fields.
195    *
196    * <p>This method extracts a row from the table using the given row index and retrieves
197    * only the specified fields from the row.
198    *
199    * @param row    The 1-based index of the row to retrieve.
200    * @param clazz  The class type representing the table row.
201    * @param fields The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
202    * @param <T>    The type of the row representation.
203    * @return An object representing the row with the chosen fields.
204    */
205   default <T> T readRow(int row, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields) {
206      return readRow(DEFAULT_TYPE, row, clazz, fields);
207   }
208
209   /**
210    * Reads a single row from the table using a 1-based index with a specified table component type.
211    *
212    * <p>This method extracts a row from a table component using the given row index and retrieves
213    * only the specified fields.
214    *
215    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
216    * @param row                The 1-based index of the row to retrieve.
217    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table row.
218    * @param fields             The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
219    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
220    * @return An object representing the row with the chosen fields.
221    */
222   <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields);
223
224   /**
225    * Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria and retrieves only the specified fields.
226    *
227    * <p>This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria and extracts only
228    * the specified fields.
229    *
230    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values used to identify the row.
231    * @param clazz          The class type representing the table row.
232    * @param fields         The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
233    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
234    * @return An object representing the row matching the search criteria with chosen fields.
235    */
236   default <T> T readRow(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz,
237                         TableField<T>... fields) {
238      return readRow(DEFAULT_TYPE, searchCriteria, clazz, fields);
239   }
240
241   /**
242    * Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria using a specified table component type.
243    *
244    * <p>This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria within the specified table component
245    * and extracts only the specified fields.
246    *
247    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
248    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to identify the row.
249    * @param clazz              The class type representing the table row.
250    * @param fields             The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
251    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
252    * @return An object representing the row matching the search criteria with chosen fields.
253    */
254   <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz,
255                 TableField<T>... fields);
256
257   /**
258    * Inserts values into a specific row in the table.
259    *
260    * <p>This method inserts values into the fields of a specified row in the table using the default table
261    * component type.
262    *
263    * @param row       The 1-based index of the row where values should be inserted.
264    * @param classType The class type representing the table row.
265    * @param data      The object containing the values to insert.
266    * @param <T>       The type of the row representation.
267    */
268   default <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, T data) {
269      insertCellValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, row, classType, data);
270   }
271
272   /**
273    * Inserts values into a specific row in the table using a specified table component type.
274    *
275    * <p>This method inserts values into the fields of a specified row in the table for a given table component
276    * type.
277    *
278    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
279    * @param row                The 1-based index of the row where values should be inserted.
280    * @param classType          The class type representing the table row.
281    * @param data               The object containing the values to insert.
282    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
283    */
284   <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> classType, T data);
285
286   /**
287    * Inserts values into a specific cell in the table.
288    *
289    * <p>This method inserts values into a particular field of a specified row.
290    *
291    * @param row       The 1-based index of the row where the values should be inserted.
292    * @param classType The class type representing the table row.
293    * @param field     The field in which values should be inserted.
294    * @param values    The values to insert into the field.
295    * @param <T>       The type of the row representation.
296    */
297   default <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, String... values) {
298      insertCellValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, row, classType, field, 1, values);
299   }
300
301   /**
302    * Inserts values into a specific cell in the table using a specified table component type.
303    *
304    * <p>This method inserts values into a particular field of a specified row for a given table component type.
305    *
306    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
307    * @param row                The 1-based index of the row where the values should be inserted.
308    * @param classType          The class type representing the table row.
309    * @param field              The field in which values should be inserted.
310    * @param values             The values to insert into the field.
311    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
312    */
313   default <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> classType,
314                                    TableField<T> field, String... values) {
315      insertCellValue(tableComponentType, row, classType, field, 1, values);
316   }
317
318   /**
319    * Inserts values into a specific indexed cell within a row in the table.
320    *
321    * <p>This method inserts values into a specified field of a row at a particular index position.
322    *
323    * @param row       The 1-based index of the row where the values should be inserted.
324    * @param classType The class type representing the table row.
325    * @param field     The field in which values should be inserted.
326    * @param index     The 1-based index of the cell within the field.
327    * @param value     The values to insert into the field at the given index.
328    * @param <T>       The type of the row representation.
329    */
330   default <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, int index, String... value) {
331      insertCellValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, row, classType, field, index, value);
332   }
333
334   /**
335    * Inserts values into a specific indexed cell within a row in the table using a specified table component type.
336    *
337    * <p>This method inserts values into a specified field of a row at a particular index position
338    * for a given table component type.
339    *
340    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
341    * @param row                The 1-based index of the row where the values should be inserted.
342    * @param classType          The class type representing the table row.
343    * @param field              The field in which values should be inserted.
344    * @param index              The 1-based index of the cell within the field.
345    * @param value              The values to insert into the field at the given index.
346    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
347    */
348   <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field,
349                            int index, String... value);
350
351   /**
352    * Inserts a value into a specific cell in the table based on search criteria.
353    *
354    * @param searchCriteria The criteria used to locate the row.
355    * @param classType      The class type representing the table row.
356    * @param field          The field representing the cell.
357    * @param values         The values to be inserted into the cell.
358    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
359    */
360   default <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field,
361                                    String... values) {
362      insertCellValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, searchCriteria, classType, field, 1, values);
363   }
364
365   /**
366    * Inserts values into a specific cell in a row that matches the search criteria.
367    *
368    * <p>This method inserts values into a particular field of a row that matches the given search criteria
369    * using a specified table component type. It defaults to inserting at the first available index.
370    *
371    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
372    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to identify the row.
373    * @param classType          The class type representing the table row.
374    * @param field              The field in which values should be inserted.
375    * @param values             The values to insert into the field.
376    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
377    */
378   default <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria,
379                                    Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field,
380                                    String... values) {
381      insertCellValue(tableComponentType, searchCriteria, classType, field, 1, values);
382   }
383
384   /**
385    * Inserts values into a specific indexed cell within a row that matches the search criteria.
386    *
387    * <p>This method inserts values into a particular field of a row that matches the given search criteria
388    * using the default table component type at a specified cell index.
389    *
390    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values used to identify the row.
391    * @param classType      The class type representing the table row.
392    * @param field          The field in which values should be inserted.
393    * @param index          The 1-based index of the cell within the field.
394    * @param values         The values to insert into the field at the given index.
395    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
396    */
397   default <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field,
398                                    int index, String... values) {
399      insertCellValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, searchCriteria, classType, field, index, values);
400   }
401
402   /**
403    * Inserts values into a specific indexed cell within a row that matches the search criteria using a specified
404    * table component type.
405    *
406    * <p>This method inserts values into a particular field of a row that matches the given search criteria
407    * at a specified cell index.
408    *
409    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
410    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to identify the row.
411    * @param classType          The class type representing the table row.
412    * @param field              The field in which values should be inserted.
413    * @param index              The 1-based index of the cell within the field.
414    * @param values             The values to insert into the field at the given index.
415    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
416    */
417   <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType,
418                            TableField<T> field,
419                            int index, String... values);
420
421   /**
422    * Inserts values into all applicable fields of a row that matches the search criteria.
423    *
424    * <p>This method inserts values into all fields of a row that matches the given search criteria
425    * using the default table component type.
426    *
427    * @param searchCriteria A list of string values used to identify the row.
428    * @param classType      The class type representing the table row.
429    * @param data           The object containing the values to insert.
430    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
431    */
432   default <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, T data) {
433      insertCellValue(DEFAULT_TYPE, searchCriteria, classType, data);
434   }
435
436   /**
437    * Inserts values into all applicable fields of a row that matches the search criteria using a specified table
438    * component type.
439    *
440    * <p>This method inserts values into all fields of a row that matches the given search criteria.
441    *
442    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
443    * @param searchCriteria     A list of string values used to identify the row.
444    * @param classType          The class type representing the table row.
445    * @param data               The object containing the values to insert.
446    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
447    */
448   <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria,
449                            Class<T> classType, T data);
450
451   /**
452    * Filters the table based on a specified field and filter strategy.
453    *
454    * @param tclass         The class type representing the table row.
455    * @param column         The field representing the column to be filtered.
456    * @param filterStrategy The strategy used for filtering (e.g., SELECT_ONLY, UNSELECT_ALL).
457    * @param values         The values to filter.
458    * @param <T>            The type of the row representation.
459    */
460   default <T> void filterTable(Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, FilterStrategy filterStrategy,
461                                String... values) {
462      filterTable(DEFAULT_TYPE, tclass, column, filterStrategy, values);
463   }
464
465   /**
466    * Filters the table based on a specified field and filter strategy.
467    *
468    * <p>This method applies the provided {@link FilterStrategy} to the given {@link TableField}
469    * for a table component of the specified type, including only rows that match one or more
470    * of the supplied values.
471    *
472    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component to filter.
473    * @param tclass             The class type representing the table rows.
474    * @param column             The field (column) on which to apply the filter.
475    * @param filterStrategy     The filtering strategy to use (e.g., SELECT_ONLY, UNSELECT_ALL).
476    * @param values             The values to filter by.
477    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
478    */
479   <T> void filterTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column,
480                        FilterStrategy filterStrategy, String... values);
481
482   /**
483    * Sorts the table based on a specified field and sorting strategy.
484    *
485    * @param tclass          The class type representing the table row.
486    * @param column          The field representing the column to be sorted.
487    * @param sortingStrategy The sorting strategy (e.g., ascending or descending).
488    * @param <T>             The type of the row representation.
489    */
490   default <T> void sortTable(Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, SortingStrategy sortingStrategy) {
491      sortTable(DEFAULT_TYPE, tclass, column, sortingStrategy);
492   }
493
494   /**
495    * Sorts the table based on the specified column and sorting strategy.
496    *
497    * <p>This method applies sorting to a table based on the given column and sorting strategy,
498    * using the specified table component type.
499    *
500    * @param tableComponentType The type of the table component.
501    * @param tclass             The class type representing the table rows.
502    * @param column             The column to be sorted.
503    * @param sortingStrategy    The sorting strategy to be applied (e.g., ascending or descending).
504    * @param <T>                The type of the row representation.
505    */
506   <T> void sortTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column,
507                      SortingStrategy sortingStrategy);
508
509   /**
510    * Validates a table against a set of assertions.
511    *
512    * @param table      The table object to validate.
513    * @param assertions The assertions to apply.
514    * @param <T>        The type of the table rows.
515    * @return A list of assertion results.
516    */
517   <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> validate(Object table, Assertion... assertions);
518
519}
